    2 x Plasma Burst
    2 x Primary Laser

    2 x Rapid Ascent
    2 x Rapid Conversion
    2 x Ready for Action
    2 x Repair Bay
    2 x Team-Up Tactics
  2. Can I put Rapid Ascent on a non-Ranged character?
    Yes. It will still get the +1 defense bonus, although the ability of Rapid Ascent wonâ€™t trigger.
